entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
